title: Republicans Continue to Spread Baseless Claims About Pelosi Attack
description: Some of the conspiracy theories have already seeped into the Republican mainstream.

title: Elon Musk, Plus a Circle of Confidants, Tightens Control Over Twitter
description: The billionaire and a group of his friends and advisers are working on layoff plans and how to swiftly change Twitter’s product, said people with knowledge of the matter.

title: Letters, Tweets, TV: How Midterm Disinformation Has Washed Over Pennsylvania
description: One state’s experience underscores how pervasive false and misleading information has become in the country’s electoral process, online and off.

title: FTC Accuses Chegg Homework Help App of ‘Careless’ Data Security
description: Chegg, a homework help app, exposed the data of 40 million users, including details about some students’ sexual orientation and religion, regulators said in a legal complaint.

title: Instagram Users Report Widespread Disruptions
description: Some users said they could not access the social media app and had been notified that their accounts were suspended.
